posts.post_content:
I have for trade a T201 Abstein/Butler, graded SGC 10.  I am looking for a graded T201 Lush/Hauser for my collection in similar condition, preferably by SGC.  I would also consider other Pre-War graded Cardinals.  Thanks for stopping by.

Bump.  Anyone looking for a trade?
